injuries.content: 20220718 Boston Red Sox: Richie Martin diagnosed with a tender elbow, is day-to-day for one week. 20220718 New York Mets: Mike Trout diagnosed with torn ankle ligaments, will miss 4 weeks. 20220718 Miami Marlins: Riley Unroe diagnosed with shoulder soreness, will miss 3 weeks. 20220718 Detroit Tigers: CF Andrew Benintendi was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: plantar fascitis. He's expected to miss about 5 weeks. 20220718 Oakland Athletics: LF Yang-cheng Jiang was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: hamstring tightness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220719 Tampa Bay Rays: 2B Andrew Noviello was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: quadriceps strain. He's expected to miss about 3 days. 20220719 Seattle Mariners: SP Jos? D?vila was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220719 St. Louis Cardinals: C Herbert Iser was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: heel soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days. 20220720 Milwaukee Brewers: Delta Cleary Jr. diagnosed with a concussion, will miss 10 months. 20220720 New York Yankees: 2B Ra?l Reyna was injured while getting beaned during batting practice. The Diagnosis: sprained ankle. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days. 20220721 Seattle Mariners: Jos? D?vila diagnosed with a sore ankle, is day-to-day for 5 days. 20220721 Detroit Tigers: RF Drew Vettleson was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220721 Seattle Mariners: 2B Chase Strumpf was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: hamstring soreness. He's expected to miss about 6 days. 20220721 Seattle Mariners: RP Zach Petrick was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220721 Los Angeles Dodgers: SP Madison Bumgarner was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: tender shoulder. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220722 Seattle Mariners: Zach Petrick diagnosed with a sore forearm, is day-to-day for one week. 20220722 Colorado Rockies: SP Jes?s Rodr?guez was injured . The Diagnosis: stomach virus. He's expected to miss about one week. 20220722 Houston Astros: CF Brad Czerniejewski was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: wrist tendinitis. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220722 Atlanta Braves: RP Steven Plaskett was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild hamstring strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days. 20220723 Detroit Tigers: Drew Vettleson diagnosed with a sprained ankle, will miss 3 weeks. 20220723 St. Louis Cardinals: SS Christian Hicks was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: oblique strain. He's expected to miss about 5 days. 20220723 St. Louis Cardinals: SP Zack Jackson was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220723 Minnesota Twins: LF Nick Neville was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220723 Pittsburgh Pirates: RP Cody Dickson was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220724 Minnesota Twins: Nick Neville diagnosed with a strained oblique, will miss 4 weeks. 20220724 Tampa Bay Rays: Sergio Mont??ez has suffered a setback in his recovery. He is not expected to recover for another one week. 20220724 Los Angeles Angels: 1B Scott Price was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: intercostal strain. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220724 St. Louis Cardinals: LF Michael Conforto was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: mild calf strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220724 St. Louis Cardinals: SP Ty Blach was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220724 St. Louis Cardinals: SS Drew Mendoza was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: back tightness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220724 Detroit Tigers: 2B Yoan Moncada was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: back soreness. He's expected to miss about one week. 20220724 Chicago Cubs: 2B Tekwaan Whyte was injured while throwing the ball. The Diagnosis: mild calf strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220724 San Francisco Giants: 2B Kolten Wong was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: bruised hand. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days. 20220725 Pittsburgh Pirates: Cody Dickson diagnosed with elbow inflammation, will miss 8-9 weeks.
